meta.author: Vic Mortelmans
meta.description: HTML selector that returns a flat, escaped string rather than a node tree. Suitable for use with applications wishing to embed XML in JSON(P) for cross-domain XML transfer.
meta.sampleQuery: use 'http://github.com/vicmortelmans/yql-tables/raw/master/data/xmlstring.xml' as xmlstring; select * from xmlstring where url = ""

select.execute: var results = y.rest(url).accept('application/xml').get().response; if (xpath) results = y.xpath(results, xpath); response.object = results.toXMLString();
